author: ahmad3213
body:
PR description:
NanoAOD step is added for upgrade 2017 samples (for both noPU and PU). The aim  nanoAOD production for all upgrade 2017 samples. 
Local test is done with a noPU and a PU sample as follows respectively 
runTheMatrix.py --what upgrade -l 10071.0 
runTheMatrix.py --what upgrade -l 10225.0
title: NanoAOD step added in upgrade 2017 samples
